org.hibernate.ogm.massindex.impl

Class OgmMassIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.massindex.impl.OgmMassIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MassIndexer

    public class OgmMassIndexer
extends Object
implements MassIndexer
    MassIndexer that can be register in Hibernate Search to index existing data stores.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto <davide@hibernate.org>
    See Also:
    MassIndexerFactory
